author: Master_Wu
title: A tribute to never forget
review:
Amelia Earhart Tribute is a gift with purchase that puts others to shame. With a $20 value this is an outstanding freebie that only requires a $100 purchase. 

The minifigure is quite exceptional, coming with exclusive torso and face prints as well as a hard to find leg set. The plane is wonderful to look at, but I don't recommend it for play. Most of the connection points are a bit weak causing it to fall apart fairly easily. The stand's design makes it look like a memorial, however I would have liked to see the plane held up more realistically. There are also many stickers which make it a lot like a model kit.

Overall, this set is very beautifully and authentically created. I really love this set and I recommend it for older fans of Lego. 

I hope this review was helpful!

author: Ashton_Giant
title: Amelia Earhart Tribute
review:
This set is fantastic for free ! 
 

The set is unusual as there's lots of upside-down building and pieces I've never seen before, which was great to build. It took me about an hour. 
 

This is definitely a display piece and not really for playing with, as there is nowhere for Amelia to sit in the plane.

It will look good in my lounge as it will match the decor ! 
 

I tried to review the set on Lego.com product feedback but it wouldn't let me - possibly because it is a FREE set, and therefore very good value for no money !
